description: Use five ingredients to combine the flavours of rice pudding and creme brulee into a delicious dessert with a perfectly caramelised top and surprise jam filling.
keywords: Brulee Rice Puddings With Jam Filling
name: Brulee Rice Puddings With Jam Filling Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide jam among 4 x 11/2-cup capacity ramekins. Spoon over rice mixture. Place on a large baking tray. Sprinkle remaining sugar evenly over rice puddings. Using a kitchen blowtorch (see tip), caramelise sugar. Serve warm.
